name: Bo Miller
description:
I’m a fun loving person, I love to smile always, make people smile, simple, not arrogant, respects
a woman’s feelings, I don’t trample on it at all, I am an understanding person, don’t look down on people, I’m just absolutely a simple man by any dimension you want to go by it. I love going to the beach, theaters, concerts, love to play pool, I swim in the pools, go camping sometimes or maybe picnic, a gentle walk in the parks, I love kissing, I’m romantic, I don’t cheat, I hate games and lying, I don’t ever like to hurt a woman so I hate to be lied to, I need someone who believes in herself and who wants to have a serious relationship that could lead to marriage I rather think that’s what you’re looking for.
